channel.title: Bringing Together Arlo and Heather
channel.description: Recent content on Bringing Together Arlo and Heather

item.title: Conversation
item.description: Lots of comment streams. Like a forum, sort of. Perhaps actually more like a forum than a blog; who knows. A Blorum?

item.title: Events
item.description: Jan 11 — Coming Together Day Connecting Together A space for gooey yumminess. Open and connected. If this terrifies you…enjoy brunch! When: 10:00 Where: TBD Invite me! High Tea Totally tea. Not gin. Really. Don’t ask Heather. She said formal, so here it is! When: 14:00 Where: TBD Invite me! Jan 12 — The Date Arlo is Supposed to Remember Forever The big day… Let’s get this party started!
